creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black indigo lining; dark embroidered piece; geometric floral and butterfly designs in shades of pink and gray; surrounded by woven geometric broder--black and grey; narrow pieces edging on three sides; top border has horizontal woven band in black and grey; three attached loops--center and each corner on top
title: Baby Carrier
